sourcesContent: import React, { Component } from 'react'; import { Menu, Icon, Dropdown } from 'semantic-ui-react'; import record from '../ethereum/record'; import web3 from '../ethereum/web3'; import { Link } from '../routes'; import { Router } from '../routes'; //Header that is used in all pages export default class MenuBar extends Component { onClickedPatient = async event => { event.preventDefault(); const accounts = await web3.eth.getAccounts(); Router.pushRoute(`/record/${accounts[0]}`); } onClickedDoctor = async event => { event.preventDefault(); const accounts = await web3.eth.getAccounts(); Router.pushRoute(`/doctor/${accounts[0]}`); } render() { return ( Home Dashboard Records List View Profile Edit Profile Make Appointment Update Appointment View Profile Edit Profile Allow Access Revoke Access Patient Doctor ); } }
